FuncDef: This command enables the context to configure HS WRR group information in the egress queue group template. Thehs-wrr-groupcommand is used to provision the rate and class weight of each of the two WRR scheduling groups that can be utilized by the egress queue group instance HSQ queues.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the HS WRR group identifier. WRR group ID 1 or 2 must be specified when executing the hs-wrr-group command. The specified group ID identifies which WRR group context is entered for editing. Values-1, 2.
